questions.title: What is Svelte?
questions.content: Svelte is a front-end framework for building web applications.

questions.title: How do I install Svelte?
questions.content: You can install Svelte via npm using the command: npm create svelte@latest.

questions.title: What is the difference between Svelte and React?
questions.content: Svelte compiles components at build time, while React uses virtual DOM diffing at runtime.

questions.title: What is the difference between Svelte and React?
